short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select images to directly convert to webp with all the handling done on the client side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension to make converting images to .webp easy.

Can be used independantly, is used as an add-on to https://mlockx.nl/webpify.

Features:

- Select images: Opens a popup to  for you to select images and convert them
- Convert all: Sends all images found in DOM to popup and auto converts all
- Convert to WebP: Independant Contextmenu action (Right click on image).
